name: ATV Dirt Bike Rider ( 3D Off Road Parking / Driving Simulation Game )
name_original: ATV Dirt Bike Rider ( 3D Off Road Parking / Driving Simulation Game )
description:
If you believe that Parking is just about finding the spot, Please rethink especially when it comes to Off-road parking.
Take control of a powerful ATV Dirt Bike and race through the obstacle course! BUT first you've gotta pass this test!

This game has beautiful locations and tracks that will test your ATV Dirt Bike Riding Skills

Game Features:

• Multiple driving missions with alternate objectives - prove your driving skills!
• Beautiful realistic ATV Dirt Bike to Ride - feel the handling and suspension!
• Real physics and handling - can you handle the power?!
• Amazing 3D world, full of details to explore
• Adjustable cameras give the perfect view.
